meanings.definition: A group of highly intelligent individuals working together.
meanings.sent1: The superminds in the research team solved the problem quickly.
meanings.sent2: The superminds of the committee came up with a brilliant solution.
meanings.sent3: The superminds at the chess club always win tournaments.
meanings.sent4: Their combined knowledge created a superminds that could tackle any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The superminds of the class aced every test effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The collective intelligence or knowledge of a group.
meanings.sent1: The superminds of the team made the project a success.
meanings.sent2: We relied on the superminds of the experts to guide us.
meanings.sent3: The superminds of the family always knew the best solutions.
meanings.sent4: The superminds of the community came together to solve the issue.
meanings.sent5: Their shared superminds helped them overcome any obstacle.

meanings.definition: To surpass in intelligence or ability.
meanings.sent1: She hoped to superminds her competitors in the competition.
meanings.sent2: They aim to superminds their previous achievements.
meanings.sent3: He tried to superminds his classmates in the math test.
meanings.sent4: The team managed to superminds all expectations with their performance.
meanings.sent5: The inventor wanted to superminds all others with his new invention.
